attributes.action: New Prime Minister to Lift The Veil of Secrecy on Extra-terrestrial Life
attributes.background: New Prime Minister Theresa May to take on the failed promise David Cameron made to be 'open and frank' about Extra-terrestrial life and UFOs. To seek to lift the veil of secrecy and tell the public the truth that they deserve, which has been covered up for all of these years.”

rejection.details: We're not sure what you mean by "lift the veil of secrecy". If there's specific information you want, you could obtain this through a Freedom of Information request. Alternatively, if the information you seek is not within the scope of the Freedom of Information Act, you could petition the Government to release the information. You would need to make sure that any new petition is clear and specific about what you want the Government to do.
